page.title: 04Life on a Farm
page.content: My dad works at Pamington Court Farm. Most people think that a farm is a horrible place to live and say it smells.But it is great really because you have all the open space and if you like animals you will really like it as a lot of people do.Anyway Pamington Court Farm is kept very clean because it is a dairy farm.A dairy farm is a farm that produces milk. During September all the calves are born and sometimes you are up at 1 o'clock in the morning with a cow that is calving.A herdsman like my dad gets up at 5 o'clock to milk the cows. He can have up to 100 cows to milk at a time. For seven months of the year the cows are in the fields; for the other five months they are kept inside.
